title: Patriots CB Christian Gonzalez cleared to play on Sunday, Texans star Nico Collins ruled out

title: Man accused of targeting protesters with suspected firebomb in Vermont
author: Abby Patkin
bullets: Crime “Witnesses state the driver sat in his vehicle in front of the protesters trying to light something coming out [of] what appeared to be a bottle,” Brattleboro police said.
Downtown Brattleboro, Vermont.

Erin Clark / The Boston Globe, File By Abby Patkin January 16, 2026 | 3:57 PM 1 minute to read A Vermont man is facing charges after police say he tried to light “some sort of incendiary device” last month upon driving up to a Brattleboro protest opposing the prospect of war in Venezuela.

title: Paul Mescal says he’s a ‘big Red Sox boy’ after falling for baseball at Fenway Park
author: Autumn Sloboda
bullets: Celebs The Irish actor revealed in a British GQ interview that he now takes baseball “very seriously” — and credits a personal connection for his Boston fandom.
Paul Mescal has added an unexpected title to his résumé: Red Sox fan.
The Irish actor revealed in a recent British GQ interview that he has become deeply invested in Major League Baseball — and, more specifically, Boston’s team.

title: Woman kicked out of Boston hotel bathroom after being accused of being a man sues
author: Abby Patkin
bullets: Local News The women allege they were denied the right to use the bathroom “because of what Ms.
